content:
I’m a second year CSE PhD student at Penn State working in LPAC under Dr. Yanxi Liu and Dr. Robert Collins. My research primarily focuses on self-supervised and multimodal learning.
Before joing Penn State I spent some time in the Cognitive Learning for Vision and Robotics Lab lead by Dr. Joseph J. Lim. I obtained my BS in CS at Portland State University while working in the Biologically-Inspired Computing Lab under Dr. Dan Hammerstrom researching brain-inspired vision algorithms. My research interests include deep learning, computer vision, and reinforcement learning.
summary: I’m a second year CSE PhD student at Penn State working in LPAC under Dr. Yanxi Liu and Dr. Robert Collins. My research primarily focuses on self-supervised and multimodal learning.
title: Keaton Kraiger
